text: Nicholas Diego Leanos (born September 6, 1996), known by his stage name Lil Xan, is an American rapper, singer, and songwriter. He was born in Redlands, California. == Career == Lil Xan became popular after he released the song "Betrayed" in 2017. Then in 2018, he released his first album Total Xanarchy. In January 2020, he released his second album Sorry I Didn't Quit. == References == ==Other websites== Category:Singers from California Category:Rappers from California Category:Mexican rappers Category:Mexican singer-songwriters Category:1996 births Category:Living people Category:American record producers
title: Lil Xan
